title: Remove Ping when muted
body: Can Riot-Games please delete the pings when you want to mute some1. When he flames u and u mute him he can still spam every 5sec 6pings and destroy your gameplay thats so annoying. Please do something. Thank you!

replies.body:
I think Riot should let you mute someone AND give you the option to mute the Pings of someone if he spams it. 

I think you should still see the Pings for the reason of if you mute someone because he is toxic that doesnt mean his Pings are not important.
